divs: sighting detailsi was driving on belfast road at around 8 o'clock at night on 12\31\2008. i noticed a very bright light travelling west to east and it was very close to the tree line. at first i thought it was an airplane but the light was so bright and solid, not flashing like an airplane does. because i am a little bit of a nerd i stopped my car and rolled down the window and i couldnt hear any engine noise. at that point i started to think that it was something more than an airplane. i started driving again when the light changed directions and started heading south. . . almost where i was. i got very nervous about what this light was and decided to hightail it to my boyfriends house. when i got to his house which is less than a 1\4 mile from where i saw the light it was nowhere in the sky. very strange. . .
Summary: I was driving and saw a very bright light in the sky but it was very close to the tree line, no noise, just a bright light. changed directions and so did I!
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Milford
There were no other sightings in Milford on or around December 31st 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
